reason.raw: because the plugin is for more generic purposes, I will try to add it to gazebo itself and will provide a more specific one (by using ros service).
reason.html: because the plugin is for more generic purposes, I will try to add it to gazebo itself and will provide a more specific one (by using ros service).

description.raw:
A model plugin \(FlashLightPluginBase.cc / hh\) for flash lights attached to a model. Assuming a model has <light> under its <link> components, this plugin modifies the lights based on the given parameters such as color, range, angle, blinking intervals etc.

Users can add their own functionalities by inheriting the class. As an example, the sample code \(SampleFlashLightPlugin.cc\) counts 10 seconds and then turns on the lights. I added a launch file to run it \(flash\_light\_example.launch\).

Users can add their own functionalities by inheriting the class. As an example, the sample code (SampleFlashLightPlugin.cc) counts 10 seconds and then turns on the lights. I added a launch file to run it (flash_light_example.launch).
